comments.body: I don't see this rule disabled in the other ember packages. What is different about this one?

In this case the Ember package is actually being published separately to npm, whereas most of the `@ember/*` packages do *not* have distinct npm packages and are resolved via Emberâ€™s build process (and are actually part of `ember-source`), but in this case the package also has no export matching what dtslint expects because of how Ember addons work.
